Namespace osu.Framework.Lists

Classes

FuncEqualityComparer<T>
LazyList<TSource, TTarget>

A list that lazily applies a transformation to elements of a source list to a target type when its indexed or iterated.

LockedWeakList<T>

A IWeakList<T> which locks all operations.

ObservableArray<T>

A wrapper for an array that provides notifications when elements are changed.

WeakList<T>

A list maintaining weak reference of objects.

Structs

LockedWeakList<T>.Enumerator
SlimReadOnlyDictionaryWrapper<TKey, TValue>
SlimReadOnlyListWrapper<T>

A wrapper that provides a read-only view into a List<T>. This can be instantiated via the AsSlimReadOnly<T>(List<T>) extension method.

WeakList<T>.ValidItemsEnumerator

An enumerator over only the valid items of a WeakList<T>.

Interfaces

INotifyArrayChanged

Provides an event for notifying about array elements changing.

IWeakList<T>

A slim interface for a list which stores weak references of objects.
